page.title: 11 Recreation
page.content: In our survey for Springfield the most popular hobbies were found to be reading and walking.There are two country parks about 2 miles outside Linlithgow, called Beecraigs,(the biggest)and newly built Muirvonside.Both are vast areas of woodland. Organisations for children in the town include the Boys Brigade,Scouts and Cubs,the Guides and Brownies,the Girls Brigade,Air Training Corp,Army Cadet Force,several youth clubs and church organisations.For adults,there are the Arts Guild,Film Society,Floral art club,Folk Club,Players,Pipe band, Reed band,Drama group,several Church organisations and night classes at the Academy.
